ch.uzh.agglorecommender.client

Class InputParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.uzh.agglorecommender.client.InputParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InputParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Reads the data set from disc according to the specifications in the data set properties xml file passed to the constructor. The parsed data can be fetch as instances of type IDataset.

    The class uses xmlBeans linked as xmltypes.jar in order to easily access the information contained in the data set properties xml file.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
